utilities

Class SocketException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • utilities.SocketException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SocketException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    Class used by Socket for communication errors.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • SocketException

        public SocketException()
        Simple constructor. Sets type to SocketException.Type.DEFAULT and that's all.

      • SocketException

        public SocketException(SocketException.Type exception_type)
        Additional constructor. Does not provide additional information for getMessage().
        Parameters:
        exception_type - Type of an exception.

      • SocketException

        public SocketException(SocketException.Type exception_type,
                       java.lang.String ip,
                       int port)
        Additional constructor. With given IP and port it provides "host[IP:port]" info for getMessage().
        Parameters:
        exception_type - Type of an exception.
        ip - IP of a host related to this exception.
        port - Port of a host related to this exception.

      • SocketException

        public SocketException(SocketException.Type exception_type,
                       java.lang.String msg,
                       java.lang.String ip,
                       int port)
        Additional constructor. Provides room for additional info before Host credentials. With given IP and port it provides "msg [IP:port]" info for getMessage().
        Parameters:
        exception_type - Type of an exception.
        msg - Message to print in addition to host credentials.
        ip - IP of a host related to this exception.
        port - Port of a host related to this exception.

      • SocketException

        public SocketException(SocketException.Type exception_type,
                       java.lang.String s)
        Default constructor. Additional info should provide info about host or in case of SocketException.Type.DEFAULT type some information what exactly happened
        Parameters:
        exception_type - Type of an exception.
        s - Additional message displayed with getMessage()
